requirements.cpu_arch: Linux x86-64, ARM 32/64, Windows x86-64, IBM POWER8, x86/i686

services.name: MediaWiki
services.description_en: Browser access to MediaWiki Document by http

faqs.question_cn: 首次访问 Mediawiki 显示错误信息正常吗？
faqs.answer_cn: 正常，您需要先完成安装向导
faqs.question_en: Error when I access Mediawiki index page first time?
faqs.answer_en: Yes, you must complete the installation wizard
